item.title: Sentence Autocompletion Using N-Gram Language Model
item.description: We almost use Google everyday for web surfing. And you would must have come across the thing that you see in the above picture. Its amazing, isn’t it!

item.title: Introduction to Machine Translation in NLP
item.description: Imagine yourself in 1800s and you plan a travel to France being a native english speaker. It would have been nearly impossible to communicate with native French speaking community.
